name: Lume-Early Prototype
description:
This is  my prototype submission for my Game Design Major's first semester project.  Finished in June 2022.

This is an early prototype of a metroidvania game inspired by games such as hollow knight and Ori and the blind forest. 

Jump and maneuver your way through the forest while collecting new powers to help you reach previously unreachable areas. Use your weapon to slice down enemies that get in your way! 

This project is my first real attempt at a proper game. We had to concept, plan, code and design all on our own! Unfortunately we only had so much time before submission - so I could not polish it to the amount I would have liked. Therefore there might be some janky things present ha! But by the time I submitted I had learned so much more about coding, and I know I could improve it much more in the future (that is - if I have the time)

Art, animation and code done by me.
